message: Let's start fairly, I'll take a bit more
That's not very fair Alice. I'll be more generous and give you a bigger share than you offered me, but I need a bigger cut or it's not worth it with inflation eating at my share.
My share stays high, yours is dropping due to inflation, don't wait!
The clock is ticking Alice.  This is my last offer above 500,000.  Don't let inflation hurt us both.
You're running out of time, each round is costing you more than the last
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer and we both win. Keep pushing and we both lose!
You're losing value fast, don't let pride get in the way
